data.title: California’s statewide cannabis enforcement taskforce continues to aggressively combat illegal market by seizing over $109M worth of unlicensed cannabis products in Q2 2023
data.excerpt: The Unified Cannabis Enforcement Taskforce more than doubled the amount of illegal cannabis seized in Q1 2023 through strategic, wide-ranging enforcement actions CALIFORNIA – Building upon the momentum in Q1 2023, the Unified Cannabis Enforcement Taskforce (UCETF) seized more than $109 million in illegal cannabis in Q2 2023. This total represents a 104 percent increase […]
